name: rows
description: The rows within the table component.

params.name: text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text for cells in table rows. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML for cells in table rows. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: format
params.description: Specify format of a cell. Currently we only use "numeric".

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the table row cell.

params.name: colspan
params.description: Specify how many columns a cell extends.

params.name: rowspan
params.description: Specify how many rows a cell extends.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the table cell.

name: head
description: Can be used to add a row of table header cells (`<th>`) at the top of the table component.

params.name: text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text for table head cells. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML for table head cells. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: format
params.description: Specify format of a cell. Currently we only use "numeric".

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the table head cell.

params.name: colspan
params.description: Specify how many columns a cell extends.

params.name: rowspan
params.description: Specify how many rows a cell extends.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the table cell.

name: captionClasses
description: Classes for caption text size. Classes should correspond to the available typography heading classes.

name: firstCellIsHeader
description: If set to `true`, the first cell in each row will be a table header (`<th>`).

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the table container.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the table container.
